fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, consume 1 Profit to build a sentry at a player’s house at the end of the night, lasting until you build a new one. The sentry can perform the factional attack astrally, leaving you free to perform other abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The sentry can only target the player whose house it was built at. It can also target players adjacent to the house on the playerlist.
- Visiting the sentry again will consume 1 Profit and upgrade it to level 2, increasing its range to up to 3 houses away from the target on the playerlist.
- Visiting a level 2 sentry upgrades it to level 3 and consumes 2 Profit, increasing its range to any player.
- The sentry cannot attack on the same night it is built. Upgrades do not apply on the same night.
- When the player with the sentry dies, it is destroyed.
- The sentry cannot be placed on Guild houses.
Item: Mini-Dispenser
- Cost 1
- Uses 1
- Resupply: Give any player +1 uses to any of their 1 or 2 cost items. Cannot resupply items with 0 uses.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
